underlying_goal: Create a Development Workflow V2 document with diagrams that captures the evolution from single-agent serial execution to multi-agent parallel team execution, including ideation flow, context management, and agent lifecycle
friction_detail: Glob/search commands timed out initially when looking for skill files, requiring alternative approaches.
brief_summary: User wanted to create a V2 development workflow document with ASCII and Mermaid diagrams covering multi-agent parallel execution, ideation flow, context management, and agent lifecycle, and Claude iteratively built and refined the document across multiple rounds of feedback.
